## Events.FinishedLoading.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `FinishedLoading` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(opt_workspace?: Workspace);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The workspace that has finished loading. Undefined for a blank event. |
